name: Jonah: A VeggieTales Game
summary: Israel's No. 1 prophet, Jonah, has a great job delivering God's messages. But when Jonah gets the call to go to Nineveh, he runs away--straight into a whale-full of trouble. Join Jonah (played by Archibald Asparagus) and Khalil the caterpillar on the voyage of a lifetime, from a stormy ride on a pirate ship to the belly of a whale, and across the desert to the city of Nineveh--where the people are so nasty, they slap each other with fishes.
